name: TemboSocial
overview:
TemboSocial is a leading provider of interactive engagement and community building solutions. Leading companies turn to TemboSocial’s hosted suite of tools to foster collaboration, conversation and recognition among employees, customers and prospects.

Our Products Include:

The Poll™ - Engage, inform and deliver relevant content to your online audience

Comment Engine™ - Build collaborative communities by empowering members to comment and rate online content

Sparkplug™ - Capture ideas, support collaboration, determine priority, and help build a culture of innovation  

The Hive™ - Recognition is a currency that has extraordinary value to your knowledge workers. Unleashing the transformational power of social media, the Hive is a peer-to-peer social recognition software solution.

milestones.description: Rideau Recognition Solutions, leader in the recognition and incentive industry, has begun an exclusive partnership with PollStream to enhance its online recognition portal offering.
milestones.source_description: PollStream and Rideau engage in an exclusive partnership

milestones.description: PollStream selected as a winner of the Backbone/KPMG Pick 20 Award for companies that are driving innovation on the Web
IDC, a global market intelligence leader, names PollStream in Top10 list of Canadian Cloud Computing Solutions to Watch.
milestones.source_description: Ten Canadian Cloud Solutions to Watch
